sentences.sContent: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=  improve people’s knowledge  ) about AIDS.
sentences.sCn: 卫生部官员努力提高人们对艾滋病的认识。

sentences.sContent: ...He said he worried about inexperienced riders' lack of awareness of bildng rules and strong negative reaction from non-cyclists...
...The hidden reason behind this is not hard to analyze as there’s a growing awareness for the authorities regarding the urgency of popularization of culture...
...it calls for people’s awareness of the serious pollution around us and actual action to reduce the waste...
...in order to invoke the public awareness of environmental protection...

phrases.pCn: 品牌意识，商标意识；品牌知名度
全球意识；完整的意识，知觉

words.tran: 意识到的；知道的；有…方面知识的；懂世故的

trans.tranOther: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation
